Map001.R0: Katana: Grand Guru! Did you just appear from nowhere?

Map001.R3: Grand Guru: In another dimension, you have the power to restore life through words.
Map001.R5: Grand Guru: An evil wizard stole the soul crystals of the elemental villages and now everything is dying.
